analysis.description:
EthearnalRepTokenCrowdsale.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x0d2424353d6650cd06b8b845f2f08e0436578d20.sol#773-784) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _to.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/9/0x0d2424353d6650cd06b8b845f2f08e0436578d20.sol#777-779)

Treasury.withdrawTeamFunds (/unique_chucks/9/0x0d2424353d6650cd06b8b845f2f08e0436578d20.sol#984-993) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- teamWallet.transfer(toWithdraw) (/unique_chucks/9/0x0d2424353d6650cd06b8b845f2f08e0436578d20.sol#991-992)

Treasury.refundInvestor (/unique_chucks/9/0x0d2424353d6650cd06b8b845f2f08e0436578d20.sol#1011-1032) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(toRefund) (/unique_chucks/9/0x0d2424353d6650cd06b8b845f2f08e0436578d20.sol#1028-1029)

	- tokenRate = crowdsaleContract.getTokenRateEther() (/unique_chucks/9/0x0d2424353d6650cd06b8b845f2f08e0436578d20.sol#1018-1019)
	- tokenContract.burnFrom(msg.sender,_tokensToBurn) (/unique_chucks/9/0x0d2424353d6650cd06b8b845f2f08e0436578d20.sol#1026-1028)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(toRefund) (/unique_chucks/9/0x0d2424353d6650cd06b8b845f2f08e0436578d20.sol#1028-1029)
	State variables written after the call(s):
